glsa.title: AWStats: Remote code execution
glsa.synopsis: AWStats fails to validate certain input, which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: AWStats is an advanced log file analyzer and statistics generator.

description.p: When 'awstats.pl' is run as a CGI script, it fails to validate specific inputs which are used in a Perl open() function call.

impact.p: A remote attacker could supply AWStats malicious input, potentially allowing the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the web server.

workaround.p: Making sure that AWStats does not run as a CGI script will avoid the issue, but we recommend that users upgrade to the latest version, which fixes these bugs.

resolution.p: All AWStats users should upgrade to the latest version:
